scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production eleventy && cross-env NODE_ENV=production postcss src/static/css/tailwind.css --o _site/static/css/style.css && mkdir _site/static/fonts/ && touch _site/static/fonts/.touch && cp -r src/static/fonts/** _site/static/fonts

name: intpub.org
description: The website for the Interplanetary Publishing Protocol, available at https://intpub.org
author: Sebastian Mellen <s@slm.space>
